short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find info about the any IP Address and it's subnet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate information on an IP Address and a given subnet. Shows details about the bits in the IP address and subnet, the address counts, the special IP's in the subnet (such as network and broadcast addresses). It also includes a tool to subnet a network into smaller subnets.
